about_the_game:
The Void threatens to devour the ancient realm of Northanda

Lead a party of legendary heroes in this tactical roguelike deckbuilder. Only your chosen champions have the power to stop the fabric of the cosmos from coming undone.

Recruit three heroes from countless possible combinations to form an unbreakable team. Heroes fill the roles Support, Slayer, and Defender, each bringing their own unique card library to a single, shared deck. Every combination opens new strategic possibilities:

  • Supports sustain the group with powerful buffs

  • Slayers exploit enemy weaknesses with devastating attacks

  • Defenders draw enemy focus and shield their allies from harm

Navigate treacherous dungeons using encounter cards, each presenting unique challenges and rewards. Pick your battles wisely as you journey toward each dungeon’s corrupted shrine.

You may face encounters in any order or set up camp to recover, but every decision carries a price. To save Northanda, the shrine’s corrupted spirit must be defeated, even if it means a tragic end for these ancient guardians.

Battles in Northanda Chronicles are role-driven and dynamic. Though your heroes share a deck, each manages their own mana pool. This precious resource regenerates slowly, requiring tactical coordination between party members.

Plan your moves carefully, manage your resources, and use each hero's role to maximum effect. Transfer mana between heroes or bide your time to unleash devastating combinations. Cooperation is essential because no single hero can stand alone against the Void.

Uncover artifacts that redefine your strategy. Enhance cards with magical gems to unlock their full potential. Seek the blessings of the ancient Aspects for otherworldly power.

With countless hero combinations and card synergies to explore, every run offers new ways to grow stronger and push back the Void.
detailed_description:
Feature List

  • Recruit and lead a team of three heroes with distinct roles and abilities.

  • Build a shared deck that balances your party’s resources to unleash devastating combos.

  • Discover powerful artifacts, blessings, and socketable gems to customize your strategy.

  • Navigate treacherous dungeons filled with tactical decisions and meaningful choices.

  • Master dynamic role-driven combat with a unique mana system that emphasizes cooperation.

  • Endless replayability with countless hero combinations and synergies to master.
